text: Meet Dave is a 2008 American comedy science fiction film directed by Brian Robbins and written by Bill Corbett and Rob Greenberg. It stars Eddie Murphy, Elizabeth Banks, Gabrielle Union, Ed Helms, Scott Caan and Kevin Hart.  The film was released on July 11, 2008.The film was released on July 11, 2008, received generally negative reviews and grossed $50 million against its $60 million budget.
